TopicTitle: Random crashes for no reason when reverting...

Articles.Content: when i revert a craft at any time, no matter what craft i am using. when i have a craft even one that crashes i click revert to launch and 20 seconds later the game finishes stop responding and closes/says the oops window. Only since 1.0 came out
